name: Fig3D
description:
Instantly convert your shapes, icons, logos and UI designs to 3D models and get a good render. All in Figma.


Features:

  • Convert shape and groups to 3D by extruding in Z - plane.
  • Render realistic images with soft-shadows from the 3D models.
  • Control view direction for the output render.
  • Adjust height and shadow direction and other light properties.
  • Switch between perspective and orthographic(isometric) projections.
  • Adjust object roughness and metalness.
  • 3D Bevel and emboss. (Corner)
  • 3D model export for external renderers.


Coming soon:

  • Saving state to continue editing later.
  • Custom 3D model import.


We are in process of adding several features and customisation options. Let me know what you think, any bugs you face or suggest features that you would like to see at palash@shaders.app
